name: ORAIKO
tagline: Software Development, Online Marketing, Web Design
description:
Founded in 2005 in New York, ORAIKO. was formed to provide professional digital services, ranging from custom software to fully functional dynamic rich websites.
Innovative Technology
ORAIKO utilizes the latest technologies that are both proven and practical. Our mission is to make the process easier for our client: we provide our clients with the right tools for, Mobile Apps, Web Development, hosting, e-commerce, security, content management, and search engine marketing.
Creative Design
ORAIKO specializes in custom website design, interactive web design, and development. We can design a web site to be consistent with company’s brand image, or help create an entirely new corporate identity.
Focused on Achieving Businesses Goals
We enhance clients' businesses by designing, developing, implementing and maintaining highly efficient and quality solutions. ORAIKO isn’t just about design; we’re dedicated to solutions with a purpose.
Services:
 Web Design
 Responsive Design
 Web Development
 E-Commerce Development
 Custom Web Applications
 Mobile Applications
 SEO / SEM
